availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cynthania, Kentucky, distiller. Clermont County, Ohio native. Son of William Megibben and Emily Stratton Megibben. Married to Elizabeth David in Harrison County, Kentucky on June 22, 1853. Father of Mary Loraine Megibben, Martha J Megibben, James William Megibben, Nancy Megibben. Distiller in Washington, Ohio in 1850. Chief Distiller at Findley and Foley Distillery in Harrison County, Kentucky from 1850 to 1853. Owner of Edgewater Distillery in 1856. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky in 1860. Distiller in Harrison County, Kentucky in 1864.

ab.bibl:
